sentences.english: So the salmon that return here are fish that were released from here.
sentences.chinese: 所以回到这里的三文鱼都是我们以前从这里放生的。

sentences.english: Delicate smoked salmon provides a heart-healthy element to your table.
sentences.chinese: 精致的熏三文鱼为您的餐桌增加有益心脏健康的元素。

sentences.english: Add sea salt and pepper on both sides of the salmon.
sentences.chinese: 三文鱼柳以盐及胡椒调味。

sentences.english: Cut the spring onion into a few pieces. Cut the marinated salmon into slices.
sentences.chinese: 青葱切段，腌好的三文鱼切成小片状。

sentences.english: Mille-feuille of salmon, duck breast, grilled apple and goose liver with port wine reduction.
sentences.chinese: 三文鱼，鸭胸千层酥配烤苹果，鹅肝及红酒汁。

sentences.english: Nuts Crashed Roasted Salmon Fillet, Saffron Risotto, Capper Sauce.
sentences.chinese: 坚果碎烤三文鱼柳，藏红花烩饭，刺山柑汁。

sentences.english: Tarragon cured salmon carpaccio, lightly smoked, Williams pear puree, organic celery shoots.
sentences.chinese: 龙蒿草烟熏三文鱼薄片，威廉生梨酱，有机西芹苗。

sentences.english: Would you like to try salmon with wasabi?
sentences.chinese: 试试三文鱼就绿芥末吧？

sentences.english: Baked Tournedos of Salmon, Caviar, Olysters with Parma Ham.
sentences.chinese: 焗三文鱼，鱼子酱，生蚝配帕尔马火腿。

sentences.english: Two Eggs Scrambled with Smoked Salmon, topped with Sour Cream and Chives on an English Muffin.
sentences.chinese: 烟熏三文鱼炒蛋，配以酸奶油，香葱和英式松饼。

sentences.english: Heat up a wok with a little oil, pan-fry the salmon until lightly golden.
sentences.chinese: 热锅，入少许油，把三文鱼煎过，盛起备用。

sentences.english: The young salmon are then released and head for the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 然后这个小三文鱼为被放入河中前往大海。

sentences.english: Smoked salmon, fennel & asparagus salad, mustard dressing.
sentences.chinese: 烟熏三文鱼，茴香，芦笋色拉配芥末调味汁。

sentences.english: My stepmother served salmon for dinner. I'm severely allergic to seafood.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭的时候后妈给上的三文鱼，而我吃海产品过敏。

sentences.english: The Rivers Tay and Tweed are major salmon fisheries.
sentences.chinese: 泰河与特威德河是苏格兰两个主要的三文鱼渔场。
